account.chooseDisplayName: Choose a display name for your account

confirmEmail.message: Please confirm that your email address is correct. Once your account is created, you will NOT be able to change your email address.
confirmEmail.title: Confirm Your Email
confirmEmail.warning: This email cannot be changed after account creation!

deletion.description: This will submit a request to delete your account and all associated data. Your request will be processed and you will be notified via email.
deletion.pendingWarning: Your account has a pending deletion request. Join the Discord to restore your account if this was a mistake.
deletion.title: Request Account Deletion

account.deletionWarning: Your request will be processed within a few days
account.displayNameHint: This is how other users will see you. Minimum 4 characters.

errors.accountDeletedMessage: This account was deleted by an administrator and cannot be recovered. All associated data has been permanently removed.
errors.accountExistsNoEmail: An account has already been created on this device. You can only have one Ascend account per device.
errors.accountExistsWithEmail: An account has already been created on this device ({{email}}). You can only have one Ascend account per device.
errors.deletedAccountMessage: This account was deleted by an administrator and cannot be recovered. All associated data has been permanently removed.
errors.displayNameTooShort: Display name must be at least 4 characters
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordRequirements: Password must have 8+ characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
errors.termsRequired: Please agree to the Terms and Privacy Policy

features.autoUpdateDesc: Keep your games and QuadDown automatically updated with the latest versions and patches.
features.cloudSyncandBackupsDesc: Sync your QuadDown profile and game saves to the cloud
features.downloadQueuesDesc: Queue multiple downloads and manage them efficiently with priority controls.
features.mobileViewDesc: View and manage your downloads remotely, and see what your friends are playing on Ascend from anywhere.
features.moreComingDesc: New features are constantly being added to Ascend
features.profilesDesc: Set up your bio, public profile, and stats. Also view other users' profiles and stats on Ascend.

account.featuresIntro: Here's what you'll get with Ascend:
account.forgotPassword: Forgot your account information? Join the Discord

form.linkWithPC: Permanently link this account with this PC
form.termsPrefix: By creating an account, you agree to Ascend's

account.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
account.noAccount: Don't have an account? Join today for free
account.pricingDetails: Start with a free 7-day trial. After that, it's just $2/month, or save 17% with $5 for 3 months, or save 25% with $9 for 6 months!

success.registered: Account created! Please check your email to verify.

verification.emailFailed: Failed to send verification email. Please try again.
verification.emailSent: Verification email sent! Check your inbox.
verification.notYet: Email not verified yet. Please check your inbox and click the verification link.
verification.sentTo: We sent a verification email to:
verification.subtitle: Please verify your email address to continue
verification.title: Verify Your Email

account.welcomeBackIntro: Sign in to access all your features:

warning.message: Please restart QuadDown without administrator privileges. Running in administrator mode causes path finding issues and other problems.
warning.title: Cannot run in administrator mode

brokenVersion.description: This version of QuadDown contains known critical issues with its functionality, like downloads, updating, and other core functions.
brokenVersion.development: While using this version you may encounter issues or crashes. Please update QuadDown to the latest version from the website.
brokenVersion.title: You're running a broken version

crashScreen.clearCache: Clear QuadDown's app cache and cookies
crashScreen.contactSupport: If the issue persists, please report it to support
crashScreen.description: QuadDown did not like what just happened. No worries, if you have analytics enabled this error has been tracked and the developer will get this fixed.
crashScreen.title: Oh no...
crashScreen.troubleshooting: Try these steps to resolve the issue:

firstIndexDialog.message: QuadDown is switching to local game indexing. It is optional for now but will be required in the future as the API is continuing to grow and get more difficult to serve everyone.
firstIndexDialog.note: You can refresh index at any time in Preferences.
firstIndexDialog.title: Game Index Required

warning.description: You are currently using QuadDown on a non-Windows platform. While cross-platform is in development, some features may not work as expected.
warning.development: QuadDown is still in active development, and it is recommended that you use Windows for the best experience. I appreciate your patience and feedback as I continue to improve cross-platform support.
warning.title: Platform Compatibility Notice

qbittorrent.checkWebUI: Please check if qBittorrent is running with Web UI enabled
qbittorrent.configInstructions: Please set your qBittorrent WebUI credentials to username 'admin' and password 'adminadmin' to enable torrent functionality.

supportDialog.message: I know I said no ads but is this really an ad? You're starting to use QuadDown and I would love for you to rate it or give me some feedback. You won't ever see this message again.
supportDialog.note: I've spent so much time creating QuadDown as a passion project. Every feature, every line of code is crafted with care. Your support means everything to me and helps me continue making QuadDown even better.
supportDialog.title: Let me know how you like it

toasts.outOfDateDesc: Please download the latest version from the official website
toasts.updateReadyDesc: QuadDown downloaded the update and is ready to install and restart now

error.help: Please uninstall Achievement Watcher from your system, then restart QuadDown. Both applications cannot run together as they use the same achievement tracking system.
error.message: QuadDown's achievement tracking service is not running. This is commonly caused by having Achievement Watcher installed, which conflicts with QuadDown's built-in achievement system.
error.title: Achievement Service Not Running

access.expiredMessage: Your 7-day Ascend trial has ended. Subscribe to continue using Ascend features like friends, cloud-sync, and more.
access.noTrialMessage: You are not eligible for a free trial. Please subscribe to access Ascend features.
access.trial: I understand I have a 7 day free trial
access.trialBlockedMessage: A trial has already been used on this device. Subscribe to access Ascend features.
access.trialEndingSoonAction: Subscribe now to keep your data safe and continue enjoying Ascend features.
access.trialEndingSoonMessage: Your Ascend trial ends in {{days}} days. After your trial expires, your cloud library and synced data will be deleted within a few days.

cloudBackups.deleteDesc: This will permanently delete this backup from cloud storage. This action cannot be undone.
cloudBackups.subscriptionRequiredDesc: Cloud backups require an active Ascend subscription. Upgrade to access this feature.
cloudBackups.subtitle: Backup and restore your game saves
cloudBackups.title: Cloud Backups

cloudLibrary.emptyDescription: Back up your game library to the cloud. Track your playtime, achievements, and progress across all your devices.
cloudLibrary.noAchievements: No achievements tracked for this game
cloudLibrary.storedInCloud: Stored in the Cloud. Not installed locally.
cloudLibrary.subtitle: Your games synced to the cloud
cloudLibrary.syncFirst: Sync your library to see your games here
cloudLibrary.syncToLoadAchievements: Sync your library to load full achievement data
cloudLibrary.title: Cloud Library
cloudLibrary.tryDifferentSearch: Try a different search term or clear your search

createRequest.gameIdHelp: The game this community is for
createRequest.name: Community Name
createRequest.success: Community request submitted! Awaiting admin approval.
createRequest.successDescription: Your request is being reviewed by our team. You'll be notified once it's approved.
createRequest.title: Request Community Creation

joinRequest.pending: Join request sent! Awaiting approval from community owner.
joinRequest.title: Request to Join

friends.emptyHint: Search for users to add them as friends
friends.hasRequestPending: This user has sent you a friend request
friends.subtitle: Connect and play with your friends
friends.title: Friends

ascend.homeSubtitle: Here's what's happening in your network

leaderboard.emptyDescription: Sync your profile to appear on the leaderboard and compete with other players!
leaderboard.subtitle: Top players in the QuadDown community
leaderboard.title: Leaderboard

messages.emptyHint: Start a conversation with a friend
messages.selectHint: Choose a conversation from the list to start chatting
messages.startConversation: Send a message to start the conversation
messages.subtitle: Messages from the last 7 days
messages.title: Messages

notifications.emptyDescription: You're all caught up! Check back later for new updates.
notifications.subtitle: Stay updated with important announcements and updates
notifications.title: Notifications

autoUpdate.description: Automatically check for game updates in the background. Get notified when updates are available and install them with a single click.
autoUpdate.title: Auto Game Update Checking

chat.description: Chat directly with your friends within QuadDown. Share game recommendations, coordinate play sessions, and stay connected with your gaming circle.
chat.title: Real-Time Chat

cloudBackups.description: Automatically back up your game saves to the cloud. Never lose your progress and restore your saves on any device.
cloudBackups.title: Cloud Backups

cloudSync.description: Your profile, achievements, and game data are automatically synced to the cloud. Access your complete gaming history from anywhere, on any device.
cloudSync.title: Cloud Sync

communities.description: Find others to play with in game-specific communities. Connect with players who share your interests and coordinate multiplayer sessions.
communities.title: Game Communities

downloadQueue.description: Queue multiple downloads and let QuadDown handle them automatically. Start downloads and come back when they're all ready.
downloadQueue.title: Download Queue

flingTrainer.description: Automatically downloads and runs FLiNG trainer for your game, no manual searching or setup required.
flingTrainer.title: FLiNG Trainer

friends.description: Send and accept friend requests, build your gaming network, and see when your friends are online. Connect with other QuadDown users and grow your community.
friends.title: Friends System

leaderboard.description: Compete with the community on the public leaderboard. See how your stats stack up against other players and climb the ranks.
leaderboard.title: Public Leaderboard

moreComing.description: There are constantly new features for Ascend subscribers. Your subscription helps fund development of exciting new capabilities.
moreComing.title: And More Coming

nexusMods.description: Seamlessly manage your Nexus mods for supported games. Browse, install, and organize mods directly within QuadDown.
nexusMods.title: Nexus Mod Managing

profile.description: Set up your personalized profile with a custom bio, showcase your gaming preferences, and let others know what you're all about. Make your profile uniquely yours.
profile.title: Profile & Bio

premium.subtitle: These are the current available features you have access to with Ascend
premium.title: Premium Features

unlimitedDownloads.description: Download as many games as you want with no restrictions. Ascend removes all download limits so you can build your library freely.
unlimitedDownloads.title: Unlimited Downloads

upcoming.description: Get an exclusive preview of what's coming in the next QuadDown update. Stay ahead of the curve and know what new features are on the horizon.
upcoming.title: Upcoming Updates Peek

webView.description: Easily monitor and manage your active downloads, and see what your Ascend friends are up to all on your mobile device.
webView.title: Remote Access

profile.noGamesHint: This user hasn't synced their library yet
profile.privateAccountMessage: This user has set their account to private. Their profile details, games, and achievements are hidden.
profile.syncDescription: Upload your local gaming stats to Ascend to share your level, playtime, and achievements with friends.

report.detailsPlaceholder: Please provide more details about your report...
report.title: Report User

search.hint: Search for users by their display name to view their profile, add them as friends, or start a conversation.
search.noResults: No users found matching your search. Try a different name.
search.subtitle: Find and connect with other players
search.title: Search Users

download.allDlcTooltip: Includes all downloadable content (DLC) available for this game
download.betaFeature: Woah... this is still in beta!

downloadOptions.getExtension: Don't have the extension? Get it for Chrome or Firefox

handlerInstructions.step1: Open the link in your browser and enable the extension
handlerInstructions.step2: Complete the CAPTCHA and start the download
handlerInstructions.step3: The extension will automatically stop the download and start it for you in QuadDown

downloadOptions.invalidLink: Please enter a valid download link for

manualInstructions.step1: Copy and paste the link into your browser
manualInstructions.step2: Complete the CAPTCHA and start the download
manualInstructions.step3: Stop the download once it starts in your browser
manualInstructions.step4: Hit CTRL+J to open your downloads
manualInstructions.step5: Copy the link that the browser started downloading
manualInstructions.step6: Paste the DDL in the input box and click Download Now

downloadOptions.noProviders: No download providers available for this game.
downloadOptions.pasteLink: Paste your direct download link (DDL) here

seamlessInstructions.description: QuadDown will automatically process the download link and convert it to a direct download link
seamlessInstructions.title: Start Seamless Download

downloadOptions.selectProviderPrompt: Please select a download provider to see the instructions.

torboxInstructions.description: QuadDown will automatically debrid your Torbox link and retrieve a premium direct download link
torboxInstructions.title: Start download with Torbox

torrentInstructions.description: Click the button below to download the torrent file. Make sure you have a torrent client installed and a VPN enabled for safe downloading.
torrentInstructions.noTorrent: qBittorrent WebUI cannot be accessed. Check settings for more information.

downloadOptions.waitingForBrowser: Waiting for your browser to send the download...

download.gameNeedsEmulator: This requires an emulator to run.
download.gameNeedsVR: VR may be required for this game.
download.gameNotRated: This game has not been reviewed by critics

installSizeInfo.description: The installation size is an estimate of how much space the game will take on your disk after extraction. Compressed downloads expand when extracted, so the final size is typically larger than the download size.
installSizeInfo.note: After the download is complete the compressed file will be deleted and should only take the amount of space listed next to game size.
installSizeInfo.title: About Installation Size

newUserGuide.description: You haven't installed a game before, so QuadDown will guide you through the setup process.
newUserGuide.steps: [{'description': 'The QuadDown Download Handler will automatically stop the download in your browser and start it for you in QuadDown. If you don\'t have it, close the guide and click the "Don\'t have the extension? Get it for Chrome or Firefox" button to download it.', 'title': 'The QuadDown Download Handler'}, {'description': 'After installing the extension, click the extension icon to enable the handler.', 'title': 'Step 1: Enable the Handler'}, {'description': 'The extension can stay on as it will only send known providers to QuadDown.', 'title': 'The Download Handler'}, {'description': 'Complete the CAPTCHA, and start the download.', 'title': 'Step 2: Start the download'}, {'description': 'Once the download tries to start, you will see a popup asking to open QuadDown. Toggle the always allow button to allow the extension to always send known providers to QuadDown.', 'title': 'Step 3: Using the Extension'}, {'description': 'Click the button to Open QuadDown.', 'title': 'Step 4: Downloading'}, {'description': "Your download will automatically start in QuadDown. If you're not brought to the download page, navigate to it.", 'title': "That's it!"}]
newUserGuide.title: Downloading with QuadDown

noDownloadPath.desc: You haven't set a download directory yet. Please go to Settings to choose where your games will be saved.
noDownloadPath.title: No Download Directory Set

download.noGameInfoAvailable: Setup QuadDown Xtra in Preferences to see more information about this game
download.noReviewsExplanation: This game doesn't have any professional critic reviews available on OpenCritic. This could be because it's a new release, an indie title, or simply hasn't been reviewed yet.
download.notExactMatch: Game name didn't match exactly. Report the game if needed.
download.onlineFixWarningDescription: This game comes with Online-Fix installed, when you launch it you will see a prompt telling you that it is made by Online-Fix team. This is normal and should only show once ever for each game with it.
download.onlineTooltip: Online multiplayer capabilities enabled through online-fix.me
download.openCriticBetaWarning: This API endpoint is in beta and there may be issues. If OpenCritic shows a different game, please report the game by clicking 'Report' to the right of the title.
download.outdatedIndexWarning: This game's index is outdated. Please refresh the page to see the latest information.
download.pressEscToGoBack: Click Me or ESC key to go back

protectYourself.learnHow: How to protect yourself from fake downloads
protectYourself.warning: Do not click on any ads or deceptive download buttons. The file size should match what you see here - be suspicious of small KB-sized files.

queue.description: Another download is currently in progress. Would you like to add this game to the queue or start it now?
queue.title: Download in Progress

download.ratingTooltip: This game is rated {{rating}} out of 5 stars by others on QuadDown. Read comments about this game in the Discord server.
download.reportDescription: Please provide more details about the issue
download.reportError: Please provide a reason and details for your report
download.reportReason: Why are you reporting this game?
download.scrollToViewMore: Scroll to view more game details

selectPath.description: You have additional directories set in your preferences, choose from one below to download this game.
selectPath.title: Where do you want to download this game?

download.steamRating: This game is rated {{rating}} apples. Apple ratings are different than Star ratings on QuadDown, and are more of a general rating of the game.

toast.downloadQueueLimit: Only one download at a time. Sign in with Ascend for unlimited downloads.
toast.downloadQueued: Download added to queue - will start when current download finishes
toast.invalidLink: Please enter a valid download link
toast.invalidProtocolUrl: Sent URL is invalid. Please try again
toast.noDownloadDirectory: Please set a download directory in Preferences first
toast.noGameData: No game data was passed down
toast.torboxOffline: This provider is offline on Torbox at the moment. Try another provider.

update.description: This will reinstall the game in the same directory. While most games save data in separate locations, it is recommended to back up any important save files or custom content before proceeding with the update.
update.title: Ready to update {{game}}?

actions.killDownloadDescription: This will permanently stop the download and delete all downloaded files. This action cannot be undone.
actions.legacyGameVerification: File verification is only available for games downloaded after QuadDown version 8.1.2

ascendRequired.description: You already have a download in progress. Want to download multiple games at once?
ascendRequired.suggestion: Join Ascend to unlock unlimited simultaneous downloads and support the solo developer behind QuadDown. Or pause your current download first to start this one.
ascendRequired.title: Download Multiple Games at Once

downloads.completedDescription: Your game is done downloading and ready to play
downloads.connectionBrokenError: The download connection was interrupted. Try enabling Single Stream Download in QuadDown Preferences for a more stable download.
downloads.connectionResetError: The download could not start because the connection was aborted. Your internet service provider may be blocking this specific download source, consider using a VPN.
downloads.contentTypeError: The downloader reported a content type error. This most likely means the download link has expired.
downloads.errorReportedDescription: Thank you for helping improve QuadDown. QuadDown developer team will investigate this issue.
downloads.extractingDescription: Extracting game files may take up to 30 minutes depending on the file size.

firstTimeDownload.message: QuadDown will continue to download games in the background if you close the application. You can stop the download at any time by clicking the action button then clicking the "Stop Download" button.
firstTimeDownload.title: Downloading on QuadDown

downloads.largeFileNotice: This file is larger than others and is taking longer to extract...
downloads.noDownloadsMessage: You're not downloading anything right now, start a download to track its progress here.
downloads.noFilesError: The downloader could not find any files to download. This most likely means the file was removed from the source.
downloads.noSpaceLeftError: No space left on device. Please free up disk space to continue the download.
downloads.resumeErrorDescription: Could not resume the download. The download link may have expired or the cached data is missing.
downloads.retryDataNotAvailable: Retry data not available. The download will be deleted and you will have to manually restart the download.
downloads.stoppedDescription: The download has been stopped. Click Resume to continue from where it left off.
downloads.verificationFailedDesc: Some game files could not be verified. This may be due to corrupted downloads or antivirus interference.
downloads.verificationSuccessDesc: All game files have been verified
downloads.verifyingDescription: QuadDown is verifying the game files. This may also take a while depending on the game size.
downloads.waitingDescription: qBittorrent is looking for peers to connect to download pieces of the torrent file from other users and upload to them in turn. Others may be able to see what you're downloading and/or determine your public IP address.
downloads.windowsDefenderError: Windows detected a false positive and prevented the download from completing. Please enable Protect Directories in QuadDown preferences.

gameCard.ratingTooltip: This is an average rating from others who have downloaded and played this game on QuadDown.

verified.alwaysWorkingDesc: Verified to work properly after updates and works with all of the features of QuadDown
verified.dialogDescription: This game has been verified by the QuadDown community and works with all of QuadDown's features.
verified.highlyRatedDesc: Consistently receives excellent ratings from the community
verified.mostPopularDesc: Among the most downloaded and played games on QuadDown
verified.selectionCriteria: Verified games are carefully selected based on community feedback, download statistics, and quality assurance testing.

gameScreen.aboutSoundtracks: tracks were fetched and are provided by
gameScreen.clickToToggleLogo: Click to toggle between logo and text
gameScreen.cloudLibraryPromoDesc: Sync your games across devices with Ascend
gameScreen.helpOthers: Take a moment to rate and review this game out of 5 stars. Your feedback helps others understand the game's quality and reliability.
gameScreen.launchOptionsDescription: Enter the launch command for this game. These arguments will be passed to the game executable.
gameScreen.launchWithTrainerDescription: Automatically start the trainer when playing this game
gameScreen.modDetails: View mod details and download files
gameScreen.modsAscendPromo: Browse and download mods directly in QuadDown with Ascend. Get access to thousands of mods from Nexus Mods without leaving the app.
gameScreen.modsDescription: This game has mods available on Nexus Mods. Browse and download mods to enhance your gaming experience.
gameScreen.noAchievementsDescription: No achievements found for this game. Play the game and QuadDown will automatically detect and track them.
gameScreen.noFilesFound: No files available. View on Nexus Mods for more options.
gameScreen.noSoundtrackDescription: No soundtrack information was found for this game.
gameScreen.trainerAvailable: A trainer is available for this game
gameScreen.trainerDownloadStartedDescription: The trainer will be downloaded to your desktop.
gameScreen.trainerEnabledToast: Trainer will launch automatically with the game
gameScreen.trainerInstallFailedDescription: Unable to install the trainer. Please try again or download manually.
gameScreen.trainerInstalledDescription: The trainer is now available in your game folder. Toggle 'Launch with Trainer' to use it with your game.
gameScreen.trainersAscendPromo: Download and use game trainers directly in QuadDown with Ascend. Get access to trainers from FLiNG Trainer without leaving the app.
gameScreen.trainersDescription: Game trainers let you modify gameplay with cheats like infinite health, unlimited ammo, and more. Install the trainer to your game folder and launch it automatically with your game.
gameScreen.updateAvailableDescription: A newer version of this game is available. Would you like to update this game?
gameScreen.updateAvailableDescriptionNoAuth: A newer version of this game is available. With Ascend, updates can be handled automatically.
gameScreen.updateManualHint: You can also update your local index manually and then reinstall the game to get the latest version.

emptyState.global: Search for games, settings, or features

footer.description: QuadDown is built and maintained by a single developer as a passion project. Your support funds QuadDowns servers, keeps the app ad-free, and motivates continuous improvement for everyone.
footer.title: Help Keep QuadDown Free

home.noRecentGames: Your top 3 recent games show here

library.addGameDescription1: Add your own games or import from Steam.

library.confirmRemoveFolderDesc: Are you sure you want to remove this folder? All games inside will be moved back to your main library.

executableManager.bigPictureWarning: You will need to use your mouse to add executables in Big Picture Mode
executableManager.description: Manage the executable files for this game. The primary executable will be launched when you click Play.
executableManager.exeLocationHint: Can't find the executable? It may be in a subfolder like "bin", "x64", "x86", or "Binaries".
executableManager.title: Manage Executables

executableSelect.description: This game has multiple executables set. Which one do you want to run?
executableSelect.title: Select Executable

library.importFailedDesc: There was a problem importing your Steam games. Please try again or check your directory.
library.importSteamGamesDescription: Choose the steamapps directory you want to import in and QuadDown will import all the games in that directory. Online, DLC, version tags and other metadata will be skipped while adding the games.
library.importSuccessDesc: Your Steam games have been imported successfully. Some game covers along with executable paths may be missing or incorrect, you can fix this by updating the game info.
library.importingGamesDesc: Please wait while your Steam games are being imported. This may take a few minutes depending on your library size.
library.launchErrorMessage: Failed to run {{game}}. Sometimes game executables are not named the same as the game name. Please make sure QuadDown is trying to run the correct file.
library.lessThanMinute: Less than a minute on this game

ascendPromo.message: At $2/month, Ascend would take {{months}} months to equal what you've saved. That's {{years}} years of cloud sync, friends, and more.
ascendPromo.title: You've saved a fortune!

libraryValue.description1: Estimated retail value of your game library based on
libraryValue.title: Library Value

library.loadingLibraryMessage: QuadDown is gathering up all your games for you. If you are able to read this message, it is taking a little longer than expected.
library.neverPlayed: You haven't played this game yet

newFolder.desc: Enter a name for the new folder
newFolder.exists: A folder with this name already exists
newFolder.title: New Folder

library.noResultsFound: No results found. Be precise with your search.

playLater.subtitle: Games you've saved to download later
playLater.title: Play Later

rateGame.commentPlaceholder: e.g., I had a good time playing but...
rateGame.description: Share your experience with {{game}}. Your rating helps other players determine if {{game}} is worth playing.
rateGame.errorDesc: Unable to submit your rating. Please try again later.
rateGame.missingRatingDesc: Please select a rating before submitting
rateGame.title: Rate {{game}}

library.renameFolderDesc: Enter a new name for this folder.
library.searchForCoverImage: Search for a cover image to replace the current one
library.searchGameCover: Search QuadDown for an image cover
library.searchGameCoverNotice: Covers will be searched from the current indexed SteamRIP source.
library.shortcutError: Error creating shortcut. Maybe the executable path doesn't exist?
library.steamNotRunningMessage: Online-Fix games require Steam to be running. Please start Steam and make sure you're signed into your account then launch the game again.
library.steamappsDirectoryMissingCommon: The selected directory does not contain any games. Please select the `common` directory within the steamapps directory.
library.thisIsNamedThat: This folder is already named that

vrWarning.description: This is a virtual reality game and may require you to launch the game through SteamVR or your Meta Quest app. Running the game directly may cause your headset to not connect to the game.
vrWarning.learnMore: Learn More About Running VR Games
vrWarning.title: VR Games and QuadDown

localRefresh.blacklistWarning: Your index won't be shared because you have custom blacklisted games. Remove them to share your index with the community.
localRefresh.description: Refresh your game index to see the latest available games.
localRefresh.downloadSharedIndexDesc: Download an index scraped and shared by someone else on QuadDown.
localRefresh.scrapeFromSteamRIPDesc: Build your own index by scraping game data directly
localRefresh.shareIndexDesc: Automatically upload your index after refresh to help other users
localRefresh.stopConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to stop the refresh process? Progress will be lost and you'll need to start again.
localRefresh.switchToLocalNotReady: Refresh the index first to enable
localRefresh.switchToLocalReady: Your local index is ready to use
localRefresh.title: Local Game Index
localRefresh.waitingForCookie: Cookie expired - waiting for new cookie...
localRefresh.whatThisDoesDescription: The local index stores game data on your device for faster browsing and offline access. Refreshing updates the index with the latest games from SteamRIP.

profile.levelProgress: Earn experience and level up by playing games on QuadDown!
profile.noDownloadHistoryDesc: Your game download history will appear here
profile.noGamesDesc: Hey, play some games already! Your profile is still empty!
profile.privateNotesPlaceholder: Write down something to keep in mind for later...

refreshDialog.clickToOpen: Click the button below to open SteamRIP:
refreshDialog.cookieExpiredDesc: The cookie has expired during the refresh process. You'll need to get a new one to continue.
refreshDialog.cookieNote: The cookie should be a long string of letters and numbers.
refreshDialog.cookieReceivedDesc: Successfully received the cookie from the extension!
refreshDialog.cookieRefreshDescription: Complete the verification again to get a fresh cookie and continue the refresh.
refreshDialog.detectingDesc: Checking if Cloudflare protection is active on SteamRIP
refreshDialog.extStep1: Complete the Cloudflare captcha on the SteamRIP page
refreshDialog.extStep2: Look for the QuadDown extension popup
refreshDialog.extStep3: Click 'Send to QuadDown' in the popup
refreshDialog.listeningDesc: QuadDown is waiting to receive the cookie from the browser extension.
refreshDialog.manualStep2Desc: Click on 'Network' in the DevTools panel
refreshDialog.manualStep3Desc: Press F5 or click the refresh button
refreshDialog.manualStep4Desc: Look for 'posts' in the network requests list
refreshDialog.manualStep5Desc: Click on the request → Cookies tab → Copy cf_clearance value
refreshDialog.noExtensionDesc: I'll manually copy the cookie from browser dev tools
refreshDialog.orJustGetExtension: Or just get the extension. Click here.
refreshDialog.preparingRefresh: Preparing to refresh the game index...
refreshDialog.step1Description: First, you need to open the SteamRIP posts link and complete Cloudflare's verification challenge.
refreshDialog.step1Note: Complete the captcha/verification, then click Next to continue.
refreshDialog.step2Description: The QuadDown download handler extension can automatically send the verification to QuadDown.
refreshDialog.step2Title: Do you have the QuadDown Extension?
refreshDialog.step4Description: Follow these steps to get the cf_clearance cookie:
refreshDialog.step5Description: Paste the cf_clearance cookie value below:

search.indexedInformationDescription: QuadDown uses a custom developed database to store game links and information. Indexed information is refreshed every couple days or if a request is made. No game files are ever stored on QuadDown servers.
search.localIndexedDescription: Games are loaded from your local index. This provides faster loading and offline access to game information.
search.outdatedIndexWarning: Your local game index is out of date. Some game versions or links might no longer be accurate.
search.refreshRequestRateLimited: You've already sent a refresh request recently. Please try again later.
search.sendRefreshRequestDescription: This will send a request to refresh the game index, which can update content and add new games that haven't been indexed yet. This process may take some time and has to be manually updated. You will see the updated content once the refresh is complete.
search.usingApiWarning: You are using the public API. Consider setting up a local index for better performance and privacy.

server-status.api-description: QuadDown's main API handles game information, analytics, and reports.
server-status.check-connection: Check your internet connection and restart QuadDown.
server-status.description: View current status and server health information
server-status.healthy-description: All servers are running and responding as expected.
server-status.lfs-description: Large File Server handles bigger files like update files.
server-status.storage-description: Storage service handles small background assets.
server-status.title: Server Status
server-status.unhealthy-description: Some services are currently experiencing issues.

achievementWatcher.defaultDirsNote: These directories are always watched for achievements. You can add more directories below.
achievementWatcher.description: These are the folders that will be watched for achievements. Any achievements found will be added to your library. The Achievement Watcher is based on the original by xan105 and has been modified for QuadDown.
achievementWatcher.title: Achievement Watcher

appBranch.description: Choose your release channel. Switching will download and run the appropriate installer — the app will restart automatically.

experimental.description: Cutting-edge builds with the latest changes. May be unstable.
experimental.label: Experimental

live.description: The stable release. Recommended for all users.
live.label: Live

publicTesting.description: Get early access to upcoming features before they ship to Live.
publicTesting.label: Public Testing

switchDialog.experimentalWarning: Experimental builds may be unstable and contain bugs. Use at your own risk.
switchDialog.installer: installer and launch it. The app will close automatically to complete the switch.
switchDialog.title: Switch to {{branch}}?

appBranch.title: App Branch

ascendPromoDialog.benefit1: Get early access to experimental features and updates
ascendPromoDialog.experimentalBranchExclusiveSuffix: is an exclusive feature for Ascend subscribers.
ascendPromoDialog.title: Ascend Required

settings.QuadDownAnalyticsDescription: Help improve QuadDown by sending usage data. This data is anonymous and cannot be used to identify you.
settings.QuadDownUpdatesDescription: Automatically download new versions of QuadDown and ask you to install them when ready.
settings.QuadDownWorkshopDownloaderDescription: The Workshop Downloader allows you to download items from the Steam Workshop without needing to have an account.
settings.autoCreateShortcutsDescription: Automatically create shortcuts on desktop for games that run successfully for the first time.
settings.behaviorAfterDownloadDescription: Choose what should happen to your computer after a download is finished.
settings.communityThemesDescription: Browse and apply themes created by the community. Want to submit your own?
settings.componentsDescription: View all official app sidecars and check which game dependencies are installed. You can also reinstall required dependencies from this page.
settings.controllerConnectedDescription: Ready to use Big Picture mode
settings.controllerTypeDescription: Select your controller type for proper button mapping in Big Picture mode
settings.customColorsDescription: Customize each color in your theme.
settings.customThreadCountDesc: Higher values may improve download speed but require more CPU power and memory. Maximum: 32 threads
settings.defaultLandingPageDescription: Choose which page opens when you start QuadDown.
settings.discordRPCDescription: Show what game your playing with QuadDown in Discord.
settings.downloadLimitDescription: Set a maximum speed for downloads. 0 means unlimited.
settings.downloadLocationWarning: QuadDown cannot write files to the chosen directory. Change was not saved.
settings.downloadThreadsDescription: Download threads determine how many simultaneous connections are used when downloading.

downloadThreadsPresets.normal: Normal (8-24 threads) - Recommended for most users
downloadThreadsPresets.veryHigh: Very High (33-48 threads) - For very fast connections

settings.downloaderRunningWarning: You cannot change these settings while a download is in progress
settings.excludeFoldersDescription: Your default download directory and additional directories will be excluded from Windows Defender. This will prevent Defender from scanning these directories and deleting false-positives.

extraLanguagesPanel.additionalLangListDesc: Choose from an additional 93 languages. These languages will be translated on your computer.
extraLanguagesPanel.downloadToolDesc: You need to have the QuadDown Translation Tool installed in order to select more languages. Click Continue to download the tool automatically.
extraLanguagesPanel.title: QuadDown Languages
extraLanguagesPanel.translatingDialogDesc: QuadDown is translating the selected language. This may take a few minutes, you can leave this but do not close QuadDown.

gameBackup.description: Select a directory to enable and configure Ludusavi game save backups. Choose which games to backup in your library.
gameBackup.selectLocationToEnable: You need to have a backup directory selected to enable this
gameBackup.skipManifestCheckDesc: Skip checking if backing up the game is having issues. Only enable if you know what you're doing.
gameBackup.title: Game Backups

settings.hideOnGameLaunchDescription: Hide QuadDown when a game is launched from it.
settings.highThreadWarning: Using more than 32 threads is considered extreme and may cause instability, bans, or network issues. Use with caution.
settings.homeSearchDescription: Show the search bar and quick access buttons on the home page.
settings.indexReminderDescription: Get reminded to refresh your local index after this many days
settings.keyboardLayoutDescription: Choose the keyboard layout for the virtual keyboard in Big Picture mode
settings.languageSetNote: NOTE: This will not change game names, tags, or anything else to do with the games provided
settings.languageSettingsDescription: Choose your preferred language for the UI

linuxCompat.description: Configure how Windows games are launched on Linux using Proton or Wine.
linuxCompat.infoBoxProton: (recommended) provides the best Windows game compatibility with automatic DXVK, VKD3D-Proton, and FSR support.
linuxCompat.infoBoxWine: works but may require manual configuration for DirectX games.
linuxCompat.noRunnersWarning: No Proton or Wine installation detected. Download Proton-GE below.

protonConfirm.description: Proton-GE is a custom build of Proton with additional patches for better game compatibility. It will be installed to
protonConfirm.updateAvailablePrefix: A new version of Proton-GE is available:

settings.localIndexDescription: Refresh the game index from SteamRIP to get the latest available games. You control when to update your index.
settings.logUploadPurpose: This debug log helps the team assist you with your issue. Your data will be deleted after support is complete.
settings.logUploadWarningDesc: The logs you're about to upload will contain:
settings.logWarningActivity: QuadDown Core, Downloader Manager, Notification Helper, and Game Handler activity
settings.matureContentDescription: Allow games with mature themes to appear in search results.
settings.noControllerDetectedDescription: Connect a controller and QuadDown will automatically detect it
settings.noLudusaviToolDesc: Ludusavi is required to use the backup/restore feature on QuadDown. Clicking continue will install Ludusavi automatically.
settings.noTorrentToolDesc: The torrent sidecar is required to use the torrent feature on QuadDown. Clicking continue will install the Torrent Sidecar automatically.
settings.notificationsDescription: Send desktop notifications for downloads and index refreshing.
settings.onlyWindowsSupported: Only Windows is supported for now
settings.onlyWindowsSupported2: This feature is only on Windows

preview.cardDescription: This is some muted description text.
preview.popoverDescription: This shows how popovers will look.

settings.prioritizeTorboxOverSeamlessDesc: Always use Torbox for downloading files from hosts, even if the game supports Seamless downloads. Seamless will be bypassed in favor of Torbox whenever both options are available.
settings.publicThemeApplied: Theme applied! Click Apply Colors to save.
settings.quickLaunchDescription: Keep QuadDown running in the background after you close it in order to speed up future launches.
settings.reinstallDependenciesDesc: These are the game dependencies most games require to run. Reinstalling them will fix most issues with games not running.
settings.showOldDownloadLinksDescription: Use the QuadDown Timemachine to fetch old download links for games. Some game versions may not work or be available.
settings.sideScrollBarDescription: Show a scroll bar on the side of the application window.

sidecar.description: Sidecars are official integrations managed by QuadDown. These components function like plugins to extend the app's capabilities.
sidecar.title: Sidecars

settings.singleStreamDescription: Use a single connection for downloads. More stable for large files but may be slower.
settings.smoothTransitionsDescription: Switching between pages in the app has a smooth animation to make it feel more natural.
settings.supportCodeDesc: Enter your 6 digit support code here to upload logs automatically. Need help?
settings.supportDesc: Use your support code to connect with QuadDown's support team. Logs upload automatically.
settings.supportError: Failed to upload logs. Please try again.
settings.title: QuadDown Preferences
settings.torboxApiKeyDescription: Debrid services allow you to convert file host links into premium direct download links, bypassing speed limits and wait times. Enter your Torbox API key here to enable this feature.
settings.torboxApiKeyLearnHowtoGet: Learn how to get your API key
settings.torrentDescription: Enable QuadDown's torrent functionality. This feature requires qBittorrent to be installed and is recommended for experienced users only.

torrentWarningDialog.description: Please read this carefully before enabling torrent functionality:
torrentWarningDialog.legalWarning: Downloading copyrighted content may be illegal in your region. You are responsible for your own actions.
torrentWarningDialog.qbitWarning: This feature requires qBittorrent. Make sure it is properly configured with your VPN.
torrentWarningDialog.title: Enable Torrent Support
torrentWarningDialog.vpnWarning: Your IP address will be visible to other peers. Use a VPN to protect your privacy and avoid potential legal issues.

settings.torrentingDescription: Configure torrent downloads on QuadDown. Torrenting requires qBittorrent and a VPN is strongly recommended.

userSettings.description: Update your display name that is shown on this page. You can also use this name for Goldberg cracks.
userSettings.directoryPermissionError: No write permissions for selected directory
userSettings.title: Change Your Name
userSettings.useForGoldberg: Use this name for Goldberg cracks

settings.warningDescription: QuadDown is designed as a testing platform for video games, allowing users to evaluate gameplay, performance, and compatibility before making a purchase decision. QuadDown strongly encourages users to support game developers by purchasing games they enjoy.
settings.warningSupportDevelopers: Game developers invest significant time, resources, and creativity into creating the experiences we all enjoy. Your purchase directly supports their ability to continue making great games and sustains the gaming industry.
settings.warningSupportDevelopersCallToAction: Please support the developers by purchasing games you enjoy.

wineProton.description: Configure how Windows games are run on Linux
wineProton.protonBinaryDescription: Path to the Proton executable. Defaults to
wineProton.protonDescription: Use Proton compatibility layer instead of Wine. Proton is Valve's fork of Wine optimized for gaming.
wineProton.title: Wine & Proton
wineProton.wineBinaryDescription: Path to the Wine executable. Defaults to
wineProton.winePrefixDescription: Directory used as the Wine prefix. Leave empty to use

torbox.delete_download_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from your cached downloads?
torbox.description: Manage your TorBox downloads and cloud storage
torbox.error_no_api_key: No API key found in settings
torbox.no_completed_downloads_desc: Your TorBox server has no completed downloads
torbox.no_downloading_desc: There are no downloads currently in progress
torbox.no_ready_downloads_desc: There are no downloads ready to be downloaded to your PC
torbox.redownload_same_file_confirm: Are you sure you want to redownload this file? This will overwrite your previous download.
torbox.stop_download_confirm: Are you sure you want to stop downloading {{name}}?
torbox.title: TorBox Downloads

ascend.content: This is Ascend — you can join right now, today, after the tutorial! Connect with friends, sync your data across devices, and unlock exclusive features.
ascend.title: Ascend

downloads.content: This is your Downloads area. You can track your current downloads, check progress, and manage the downloads here.
downloads.title: Downloads

final.content: If you encounter any issues or want to submit feedback, right click anywhere on the app and select "Report Issue".
final.title: Welcome to QuadDown

gameLibrary.content: Here is your Game Library. All your downloaded or imported games will show up here, ready to launch, organize, and enjoy.
gameLibrary.title: Game Library

navigationBar.content: This is where you will switch between pages on QuadDown. You can also use the control key plus a number 1-5 to switch between pages.
navigationBar.title: Navigation Bar

profile.content: This is your QuadDown profile. You can level up having high playtime and playing games, it's all for fun! Nothing will ever be uploaded to any servers.
profile.title: Profile

resizing.content: Need more space? You can resize the navigation bar by dragging the corners to make things fit just right.
resizing.title: Resizing Navigation

searchDownload.content: This is where you can search and download games. Browse through the massive collection and find your next favorite game.
searchDownload.title: Search & Download

serverStatus.content: This hopefully green dot means everything is running smoothly. Click it anytime to see more details about all QuadDown server statuses.
serverStatus.title: Server Status

settings.content: Make QuadDown yours — adjust themes, choose your download folder, add download folders, and fine-tune other preferences here. There are also some useful features you can toggle on and off, check back after the tour to see what you may want.
settings.title: Your Preferences

tour.title: Welcome to QuadDown
tour.welcome: Let's take a quick tour to get you comfortable with QuadDown and show you some tricks.

welcome.allRequiredDependenciesHaveBeenInstalled: All required dependencies have been successfully installed. Welcome to QuadDown.
welcome.analyticsDesc: Share anonymous usage data to help improve your experience

apiMigration.goodNews: Good news! QuadDown Xtra no longer requires manual API key setup.
apiMigration.steamBuiltIn: The Steam API is now built-in and automatically configured. Your old GiantBomb API keys are no longer needed.
apiMigration.title: QuadDown Xtra Update
apiMigration.whatChanged: What changed: Steam API now provides game metadata, screenshots, and details automatically.

welcome.areYouSureYouWantToSkip: Are you sure you want to skip installing dependencies? Some games may not work properly.
welcome.QuadDownNeverCollects: QuadDown never collects personal information or game data. All analytics are anonymous and used solely to improve QuadDown.
welcome.QuadDownNeverCollectsPersonalInfo: QuadDown never collects personal information or game data. All analytics are anonymous and used solely to improve QuadDown.
welcome.automaticUpdatesDesc: Get the latest features and improvements as soon as they're available
welcome.bePartOfImprovingDesc: Join the hundreds of others helping improve QuadDown just by using it
welcome.bugFixesDesc: Receive fixes for any issues automatically
welcome.cannotWriteWarning: Looks like QuadDown cannot write files to the chosen directory. Please select a different directory.
welcome.chooseHowToHelp: Choose how you'd like to help make QuadDown better for everyone.
welcome.chooseHowYouWantToReceiveUpdates: Choose how you want to receive updates for QuadDown.
welcome.chooseWhenToUpdateQuadDownYourself: Choose when to update QuadDown yourself. You'll be notified when updates are available, but they won't install automatically.
welcome.clickTheExtensionIcon: Click the extension icon and enable the download handler when you install it
welcome.dependenciesDesc: If you are playing on a new PC or have recently installed Windows, QuadDown can help you install these essential components to ensure the best experience
welcome.everyUpdateIsInspired: Every update is inspired by your feedback. Thank you for being part of the journey.
welcome.failedToInstallDependencies: Failed to install dependencies. Please try again or skip if the issue persists.
welcome.freshNewLookDesc: Your favorite game testing app, now with a modern design and customizable themes that you've been requesting
welcome.getTheQuadDownDownloadHandlerExtension: The QuadDown extension helps you download games faster and is recommended to set up your game index in the next step.
welcome.haveWine: I have these, take me to the tour
welcome.helpIdentifyAndFix: Help identify and fix issues faster
welcome.helpIdentifyAndFixDesc: All errors will be automatically sent to analytics with an urgent flag, putting them at the top of the list
welcome.iHaveReadAndAgreeTo: I have read and agree to QuadDown's
welcome.iHaveTheseTakeMeToTheTour: I have these, take me to the tour
welcome.improvedUXDesc: Things are broken up into more pages and better organized to make sure you can find what you need
welcome.influenceFutureFeaturesDesc: Help QuadDown understand your needs and influence future updates
welcome.lightningFastDesc: V7 is optimized for speed and performance to make your experience smoother and faster than ever

localIndex.canContinue: You can continue with setup while the index builds in the background
localIndex.point1: Browse and search games instantly without waiting for API responses
localIndex.point2: Access game information even when offline or when servers are down
localIndex.point3: Faster image loading with locally cached game covers
localIndex.stillRefreshing: Your game index is still being built
localIndex.subtitle: QuadDown uses a local game index for faster browsing and offline access
localIndex.title: Setup Your Game Index
localIndex.waitForRefresh: You won't be able to browse games until the index is complete. This usually takes a few minutes.

welcome.makeSureYouHaveEnoughDiskSpaceInTheSelec: Make sure you have enough disk space in the selected location
welcome.noRunnersDesc: You won't be able to launch Windows games. Please install Proton-GE (Recommended) or Wine below.
welcome.notEnoughSpaceWarning: Woah! You have less than 40 GB of free space on the selected drive. Consider clearing some space or selecting a different drive.

noticeAppIsFree.point1: Downloads and everything related to games on QuadDown will always be free
noticeAppIsFree.point2: QuadDown won't ask for any personal details to download or play games
noticeAppIsFree.point3: If you choose to join Ascend, you'll need to create an account for those features
noticeAppIsFree.point4: Anonymous data is only shared if you opt in, and you can change this anytime in Settings
noticeAppIsFree.subtitle: If you paid for QuadDown, you were scammed. Please contact your bank immediately.
noticeAppIsFree.title: QuadDown is completely free to use

welcome.optOutOfSharing: Opt out of sharing anonymous usage data. You can always enable this later in settings if you change your mind.
welcome.optOutOfSharingAnonymousUsageData: Opt out of sharing anonymous usage data. You can always enable this later in settings if you change your mind.
welcome.personalizeYourExperience: Personalize your experience with a theme that suits your style
welcome.pleaseWaitAndRespondToAdminPrompts: Please wait and respond to any administrator prompts that appear. Do not close the application.
welcome.protonGEDesc: Best for gaming. Includes DXVK, VKD3D, FSR & patches.

protonGEDialog.description: Proton-GE is a custom build of Proton with additional patches for better game compatibility. It will be installed to
protonGEDialog.updateAvailable: A new version of Proton-GE is available:

welcome.pythonMustBeInstalled: Python must be installed on your computer in order to run QuadDown's core tools on this operating system

referral.friendThankYou: Thank your friend for sharing QuadDown around! People like them and you are the reason why QuadDown can grow.
referral.linkPlaceholder: Can you share the link or post where you found QuadDown?
referral.otherPlaceholder: Where exactly did you find QuadDown?
referral.subtitle: Help QuadDown understand where users are coming from. This is completely optional.
referral.title: How did you find QuadDown?

welcome.securityPatchesDesc: Stay protected with important security updates
welcome.seeEntireList: See the entire list of 105 languages
welcome.selectWhereYouWantYourGamesToBeDownloade: Select where you want your games to be downloaded
welcome.smartOrganizationDesc: New filtering and sorting options to manage your game searching and downloading
welcome.startTheDownload: You sit back and relax while your game downloads and extracts in QuadDown
welcome.systemWineDesc: Basic compatibility using your system package manager.
welcome.theExtensionBlocksKnownProviders: The extension also helps setup your game index by seamlessly sending authentication cookies to QuadDown
welcome.thisIsWhereAllYourDownloadedGamesWillBeS: This is where all your downloaded games will be stored
welcome.welcomeToQuadDownDescription: You're almost ready to start using QuadDown. We'll go through the onboarding process together then setup your game index, but first please read the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
welcome.whenYouClickADownloadLink: When you start a download from a known provider, the extension will automatically stop the download in your browser and start it for you in QuadDown
welcome.wineMustBeInstalled: Wine, DXVK, and other tools need to be installed and setup on your computer to run Window games. Don't worry though, QuadDown can install and set it up all just for you
welcome.wineRecommendation: Wine works, but Proton-GE is recommended for better performance and compatibility. You can install it below or skip.
welcome.youCanAddMoreLater: You can add more directories in preferences later
welcome.youCanChangeThisLater: You can always update your language later in Settings.
welcome.youCanChangeThisSettingLater: You can change this later in Settings.
welcome.youWillReceiveAdminPrompts: You will receive administrator prompts from official Microsoft installers to install the required components. Your computer may need to restart after installation.
welcome.yourContinuedSupport: Your continued support has made QuadDown what it is today. QuadDown has been completely rebuilt from the ground up with a new look and feel you've been asking for.

downloadFailure.description: The workshop item download failed. This could be due to:
downloadFailure.reasons: ['The item may be private or restricted', 'SteamCMD connection issues', 'Insufficient disk space', 'Invalid workshop item URL']
downloadFailure.suggestion: Please verify the item is public and try again. If the issue persists, try restarting QuadDown.
downloadFailure.title: Download Failed

workshopDownloader.installSteamCMDDescription: First, we need to install the SteamCMD Sidecar. This CLI tool allows you to download items from the Steam Workshop without a UI.
workshopDownloader.mainDescription: Paste workshop item links here to download them. QuadDown will add them to a directory for you to manage yourself.
workshopDownloader.welcomeDescription: Here you can download items from the Steam Workshop without needing to have an account.
